revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #32 Palma |image = [[File:Pamtre.png]] |caption = Cette Baie a dérivé d'une mer lointaine. On la cultive désormais dans la région de Sinnoh. |growtime = 5h 0m 0s |harvest = 31 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,02% |points = 950 |flavor =
*0 épicée *30 sèche *10 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }} '''Palma''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant une parcelle une [[Cornn/fr|Siam]] avec au moins 130, mais pas plus de 160 points de saveur sèche ainsi que pas plus de 80 points de toute autre saveur. La [[Cornn/fr|Siam]] aura alors des chances de muter en Palma.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 50 mins || 2 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 4 hours 33 mins 20 secs || 5 hours - 10 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Overgrow (Tendency to Expand to Empty Plots) | colspan=3|
N/A ||
0.04% |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 5 hours -
10 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 3 hours 20 mins -
6 hours 40 mins || 40 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 2 hours 13 mins 20 secs -
4 hours 26 mins 40 secs || 27 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Pamtre_Flow_Chart2.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
'''WARNING:''' Trying to mutate Pamtre while having the Cell Battery equipped may result in your [[Cornn]] mutating into [[Charti]].
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Pamtre berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.

*0 épicée *30 sèche *10 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }}
'''Pamtre''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Cornn]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of dry and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Cornn]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.

*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }}
